entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deep Link for Android with .Net Maui error - Error when navigate other page #15192
  • Latest update to Visual Studio for Mac breaks CollectionView #15189
  • System.InvalidOperationException: InvalidOperation_ConcurrentOperationsNotSupported #15184
  • [iOS] Border appears to be offsetting content incorrectly #15183
    .NET 8
  • Flow Direction updates are ignored in Android #15182
  • Error on Visual Studio Mac (Latest Version) #15181
  • Navigation between top level pages fail in Unpackaged WinUI application #15180
  • Support for Proxy in HttpClient in iOS #15179
  • Android crash when using iframe from spotify (maui blazor) #15178
  • iOS: CollectionView items don't change their size when item content size is changed #15177
  • Splash screen icon shrink when using State Manager on iPad #15175
  • Implicit style not reflected to target property when add implicit style at runtime #15174
  • The overlay when displaying Shell Flyout is not drawn correctly when the screen is rotated on iOS. #15173

Closed

  • VerticalStackLayout inside Scrollview: Button at the bottom not clickable on IOS #14257
    Backlog
  • CA1416 no longer fixed by OperatingSystem.IsIOSVersionAtLeast(XX) on MAUI 7.0.86 #15032
  • [iOS] ContentViews and Grids not rendered properly in right-to-left cultures #15095
  • Animations doesn't work on Android 11 device #15049
  • System.Drawing.Primitives, Version=7.0.0.0 error on Android 11 device #15050
  • When both relative layout width and height constraint is set, child layout is not getting focused. #13600
  • CollectionView SelectedItems not rendering on android until scrolling #7726
  • RadioButton on Windows not respecting margin #8116
    Backlog
  • CollectionView not updating when direct content of ContentPresenter #7770
  • The foreground stop running when application is not in foreground #15161
  • Shell Flyout can't change background color and cancel rounded corner #15130
    Backlog
  • Unable to load font 'monospace' #11422
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.86] [iOS/Catalyst] Grid issue with calculating * values on iOS/MacCatalyst #15018
    .NET 7 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
  • [ios] fix memory leaks in ContentView #15193
  • Add UITest Gallery and some simple tests #15191
  • Fix Android WebAuth callback for system browser flows #15187
  • [net8.] Merge main #15186

Merged

  • Enable MacCatalyst for the Apple Sign In Authenticator #15188
  • Small fixes for uitest project location and install #15172
  • Fix ContentView RTL #15114
    area/layout 🔲
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.5.0 to 17.6.0 #15134
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.14.2.1 to 4.15.1 #15089
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Android gallery fixes #15118
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.5.0 to 4.6.0 #15135
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Tests and fixes to verify that spanned views are including spacing in measurements #15119
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Allow to use system fonts #15010
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️
  • Account for padding when expanding * rows/columns to new sizes #15143
    area/layout 🔲

Updated

  • Default ANDROID_SDK_ROOT if not set #15169
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • Don't retain parameters not passed as query string parameters #14965
    t/breaking 💥, p/1, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.5.0 to 4.6.0 #15133
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Move Windows and iOS Frame measure and arrange to xplat layer #14987
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert
  • [iOS] Fix crash using SearchHandler #15034
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
